solution_line_template: Carol sold {total_sales} / {ticket_cost} = <<{total_sales}/{ticket_cost}={total_tickets_sold}>>{total_tickets_sold} tickets during three days.
So in one day, she sold on average {total_tickets_sold} / {number_of_days} = <<{total_tickets_sold}/{number_of_days}={average_tickets_per_day}>>{average_tickets_per_day} tickets.
